house_listing.house_description: M-a-g-n-i-f-i-c-e-n-t,exquisite, is the only way to describe this less than 1yr old spacious open transitional,built by ed brody sitting on approx.1 acre site.Amenities throughout. Total up grades galore,granite counters,white bright,hw flrs sun room,1st flr bdrm w/bth & the list goes on! Hurry!
